bwwExcerpt: But for all its irreverence - and there's enough off-color insouciance to offend church ladies of every denomination - 'The Book of Mormon' has the old-fashioned musical comedy heart of adults who spent much of their adolescence lip-syncing to original cast albums in their finished basements.
